name: ExistenceFilter
title: Google
Firestore
V1beta1
ExistenceFilter
description: A digest of all the documents that match a given target.

returns.description: The target ID to which this filter applies.
The target ID to which this filter applies.

The total count of documents that match Google::Firestore::V1beta1::ExistenceFilter#target_id.

If different from the count of documents in the client that match, the client must manually determine which documents no longer match the target.

The total count of documents that match Google::Firestore::V1beta1::ExistenceFilter#target_id.

If different from the count of documents in the client that match, the client must manually determine which documents no longer match the target.
